description.value: You're an expert at destroying or removing incriminating evidence from a crime scene. When using the Cover Tracks exploration activity, an yone tracking you must succeed at a Perception check against your @Check[perception|against:deception]{Deception}, @Check[perception|against:stealth]{Stealth}, or @Check[perception|against:underworld-lore]{Underworld Lore} DC (whichever is highest). If you spent 10 minutes cleaning up a crime scene, anyone investigating the scene must succeed at a Perception check against your Deception, Stealth, or Underworld Lore DC (whichever is highest) to uncover any @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Hidden] evidence.

value.value: trained in Deception, Stealth, or Underworld Lore
